languages.text: {n}Техножрец, сосредоточенно шепча молитвы Омниссии, проверяет снаряжение. Подняв глаза на вас, он буднично произносит:{/n} "Тактическая ревизия экипировки завершена на девяносто семь процентов. Критических сбоев не обнаружено. Омниссия благоволит".

{n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец, сосредоточенно шепча молитвы Омниссии, проверяет снаряжение. Подняв глаза на вас, он буднично произносит:{/n} "Тактическая ревизия экипировки завершена на девяносто семь процентов. Критических сбоев не обнаружено. Омниссия благоволит".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡正在检查他的装备，低声向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷。他抬头看着你，以实事求是的声音开了口。{/n}“战术装备检查已完成97%，未检测到严重故障。欧姆尼塞亚会眷顾我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡正在检查他的装备，低声向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷。他抬头看着你，以实事求是的声音开了口。{/n}“战术装备检查已完成97%，未检测到严重故障。欧姆尼塞亚会眷顾我们。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote está comprobando su equipo, susurrando oraciones al Omnissiah. Alza la mirada hacia ti y dice con tono neutral:{/n} «La auditoría del equipamiento táctico se ha completado al noventa y siete por ciento. No se han detectado errores críticos. El Omnissiah muestra su favor».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote está comprobando su equipo, susurrando oraciones al Omnissiah. Alza la mirada hacia ti y dice con tono neutral:{/n} «La auditoría del equipamiento táctico se ha completado al noventa y siete por ciento. No se han detectado errores críticos. El Omnissiah muestra su favor».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は自身の装備を確認し、万機神への祈りをささやく。彼はあなたを見上げて淡々と話した。{/n}「戦術装備の監査は97%完了しましたが、致命的な故障は検出されませんでした。万機神が好意を示しておられるようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は自身の装備を確認し、万機神への祈りをささやく。彼はあなたを見上げて淡々と話した。{/n}「戦術装備の監査は97%完了しましたが、致命的な故障は検出されませんでした。万機神が好意を示しておられるようだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester überprüft seine Ausrüstung und betet dabei flüsternd zum Omnissiah. Er blickt zu dir auf und sagt nüchtern:{/n} "Die Überprüfung der taktischen Ausrüstung ist zu 97 Prozent abgeschlossen. Keine kritischen Fehler gefunden. Der Omnissiah zeigt seine Gunst."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester überprüft seine Ausrüstung und betet dabei flüsternd zum Omnissiah. Er blickt zu dir auf und sagt nüchtern:{/n} "Die Überprüfung der taktischen Ausrüstung ist zu 97 Prozent abgeschlossen. Keine kritischen Fehler gefunden. Der Omnissiah zeigt seine Gunst."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre inspecte son équipement tout en murmurant des prières à l'Omnimessie. Il lève les yeux vers vous et vous adresse la parole d'un ton neutre :{/n} « L'audit de l'équipement tactique est à quatre-vingt-dix-sept pour cent terminé. Aucune défaillance critique n'a été détectée. L'Omnimessie nous sourit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre inspecte son équipement tout en murmurant des prières à l'Omnimessie. Il lève les yeux vers vous et vous adresse la parole d'un ton neutre :{/n} « L'audit de l'équipement tactique est à quatre-vingt-dix-sept pour cent terminé. Aucune défaillance critique n'a été détectée. L'Omnimessie nous sourit. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, ekipmanını gözden geçiriyor ve Hermesih'e dualar okuyor. Gözlerini kaldırıp sana bakıyor ve bir durum özeti yaparcasına konuşuyor.{/n} "Taktiksel ekipman denetiminin yüzde doksan yedisi tamamlandı. Kritik bir arızayla karşılaşılmadı. Hermesih'in inayeti üzerimizde."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is checking his gear, whispering prayers to the Omnissiah. He looks up at you and speaks matter-of-factly,{/n} "The tactical equipment audit is ninety-seven percent complete. No critical failures detected. The Omnissiah shows favour."
